power.title: Aggravating Force
power.fluff: When your infused weapon strikes an enemy, the weapon unleashes a force that rattles the foe

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the first damage roll against the target gains a bonus equal to your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The next ally to attack the target before the end of your next turn gains a +2 power bonus to the attack roll.

power.title: Cascading Blow
power.fluff: You energize your weapon so it sends out a cascade of electricity that jolts your allies into motion
power.section: Attack:MeleeweaponRangedweaponone creatureIntelligence vs. AC
Hit:1[W] + Intelligence modifier lightning damage, and two allies within 5 squares of the target are jolted.
Level 21:2[W] + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.
Miss:One ally within 3 squares of the target is jolted.
Effect:Jolted allies can shift up to a number of squares equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Corrosive Brand
power.fluff: You imbue your weapon with arcane energy that eats at your enemy's defenses, with your allies' attacks increasing the effect

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier acid damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier acid damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each time an ally hits the target, the target suffers a cumulative -1 penalty to AC, to a maximum penalty equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum 1). This penalty lasts until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Dynamic Gripper
power.fluff: You produce a mystic contraption that extends from your implement, and drag your enemy around
power.section: Attack:Melee4one creatureIntelligence vs. Reflex
Hit:1d6 + Intelligence modifier damage, and you slide the target up to 2 squares.
Level 21:2d6 + Intelligence modifier damage, and slide up to 3 squares.
Miss:Slide up to half the distance.

power.title: Energy Pellet
power.fluff: You pitch a small bolus to the frey, and it erupts in a shockwave that leaves those caught in it susceptible to similar attacks
power.section: Effect: Choose one of: Fire, Lightning or Thunder. The power gains the chosen keyword, and deals damage of the corresponding type.
Attack:Areaburst 1 within 5each creature in the burstIntelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit:1d4 + Intelligence modifier damage of the chosen type, and the target gains vulnerable to the chosen type equal to 1 + one-half your Wisdom modifier.
Level 21:2d4 + Intelligence modifier damage.
Miss:Half the vulnerable.

power.title: Ethereal Chill
power.fluff: You align your spell with the sigils you wove over your ally's armor, causing them to radiate an unnatural cold

section.name: Attack:
section.range: burst 1 centered on an ally within 5
section.target: Each creature in the burst other than the center ally
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus cold damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 3 + your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus cold damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, each time an enemy hits or misses the center ally with a melee attack, it takes cold damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 3 + your Wisdom modifier cold damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 6 + your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Forceful Repulsion
power.fluff: You trace the sigils you have inscribed on your gear to unleash the stored energy, pushing an enemy away or an ally forward

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You push the target up to 4 squares.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Up to 5 squares.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Up to 6 squares.

section.name: Ally target:
section.text: An ally can fly during the push, and if he or she ends the push next to an enemy, can make a melee basic attack against that enemy as a free reaction.
If the ally did not not end the push on a surface he or she can stand on, he or she falls.

section.name: Enemy target:
section.text: If you cannot push an enemy further because of blocking terrain, the enemy takes force damage equal to your Intelligence modifier. For each square of push beyond the first you were prevented from forcing on the target, increase the force damage by +1.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 2 + Intelligence modifier force damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 4 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and increase the force damage by +2 per prevented square beyond first.

power.title: Magic Weapon
power.fluff: Your touch imbues a chosen weapon or implement with a temporary arcane charge

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Attacks with the target gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and deal +1d8 critical damage until the end of your next turn.
The first attack with the target before the end of your next turn also deals +1d8 damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: +2 power bonus to attack rolls, +2d8 critical damage and a +2d8 additional damage.

power.title: Numbing Cold
power.fluff: You enchant your weapon so that when it hits, your foe becomes too numb from the cold to react quickly

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the target takes a penalty to triggered attack rolls equal to your Constitution modifier. The penalty lasts until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier cold damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target takes a penalty to the first triggered attack roll it makes before the end of your next turn. The penalty equals your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Purging Vapors
power.fluff: You create a streak of chemicals to emit powerful fumes both intoxicate your enemies and invigorate your allies
power.section: Attack:Areawall 5 within 5each enemy in the wallIntelligence vs. Will
Hit:1d4 + Intelligence modifier poison damage.
Level 21:2d4 + Intelligence modifier poison damage.
Effect:Each ally in the wall gains the following benefits until the end of your next turn:
+2 power bonus to saving throws.
Can make saving throws against Charm, Fear, Illusion and Psychic effects both at the start and end of his or her turn.

power.title: Static Shock
power.fluff: You imbue your opponent with a crackling arcane charge, hindering the potency of its next attack

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage, and the first attack the target makes before the end of your next turn takes a penalty equal to your Wisdom modifier on the attack roll.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half the penalty.

power.title: Thundering Armor
power.fluff: Thunder ripples outward from your implement, coalescing around you or an ally before focusing its might on a nearby enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The primary target gains a +1 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn, and you make the secondary attack.

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.range: burst 1 from the primary target's space
section.target: one creature adjacent to the primary target
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage, and you push the secondary target 1 square away from the primary target.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage, and push up to 2 squares.

power.title: Unbalancing Force
power.fluff: You point your implement and blast a foe so that it reels from your ally's followup

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you push the target 1 square.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and push up to 2 squares.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The next ally that attacks the target gains combat advantage for the attack, and pushes the target 1 square on a hit. If the ally's attack already pushes the target, increase the push by 1 square instead.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Push up to 2 squares.
